resources.string: View AppVerifier\'s source code on the GitHub website in your web browser
View AppVerifier\'s privacy policy in app
View open source licenses of code that AppVerifier uses in app
Replaces background with pitch black background when dark theme is on
Open AppVerifier\'s website in your web browser
Review AppVerifier\'s privacy policy and license (scroll down)

AppVerifier privacy policy

This app makes no internet
 connections, and does not store any data permanently other than preferences. This app can see which apps are installed on your device for the purpose of viewing information about them and verifying their validity. You can share and copy the verification information to other apps using the share/copy button and also verify the selected app by pasting from your clipboard or sharing the verification info received from others to this app. The clipboard content is not stored and is only used to calculate if the given package name and hash matches with the selected app's. The content shared to this app is not stored and is only used to calculate if the given verification info matches with the selected app's. You can provide an apk file to this app which will be temporarily stored in this app's cache directory and deleted as soon as it is done processing the needed information about the apk file.

AppVerifier's privacy policy may be updated from time to time. When it does, you will be prompted to accept the new policy upon opening the app.

Last updated: January 4, 2024.
